configurableConfig.description: Comma-separated list of app names, paths, or bundle identifiers. Add apps to the list on-demand by passing them as arguments: take advantage of the "Arg and Vars" and "Split Arg" Utilities.
configurableConfig.label: Do Not Quit

script:
ObjC.import("stdlib")

function run(argv) {
  const fromVar = $.getenv("app_list")
    .split(",")
    .map(app => app.trim())
    .filter(app => app.length > 0)

  const alfred = $.getenv("keep_alfred") === "1" ? ["Alfred", "Alfred Preferences"] : []
  const finder = $.getenv("keep_finder") === "1" ? ["Finder"] : []

  keepAlive = argv.concat(fromVar, alfred, finder)

  Application("System Events")
    .applicationProcesses
    .where({ backgroundOnly: false })
    .name()
    .filter(app => !keepAlive.includes(app))
    .forEach(app => Application(app).quit())
}
taskDescription: Quits every app except ones passed-in and configured
